meanings.sent1: She preestablished the meeting time to ensure everyone could attend.
meanings.sent2: The team preestablished the rules before starting the game.
meanings.sent3: He preestablished his study schedule, but ended up procrastinating anyway.
meanings.sent4: The teacher preestablished the seating plan to avoid any disruptions.
meanings.sent5: The chef preestablished the menu for the event to avoid last-minute chaos.

meanings.sent1: The preestablished plan helped them navigate the unfamiliar terrain.
